patthana20.5:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana20.5:1.1_0: support is not a cause or condition for the thought that gives rise to the support.
patthana20.5:1.1_1: Supportunities for the thought that relies on the formless.
patthana20.5:1.1_2: Supportions arise dependent on the thought and the basis for three.
patthana20.5:11.1_0: Being committed to the mind, the continuity of mind doesn’t give rise to mental processes.
patthana20.5:11.1_1: Being committed to the mind, the continuity of mind doesn’t give rise to mind.
patthana20.5:11.1_2: Being committed to the mind, mental processes arise because of the mind, and thoughts for the mind.
patthana20.5:12.1_0: mind doesn’t cause the mind to thoughts.
patthana20.5:12.1_1: Being committed to the mind, one who is not committed to mental processes arise.
patthana20.5:12.1_2: mind is not committed to the mental development of the mind; and mental processes arise because of the mind.
patthana20.5:13.1_0: Being committed to the mind, and not committed to the practice of exertion.
patthana20.5:14.1_0: For the sake of letting go of negligence ...
patthana20.5:15.1_0: One whose mind doesn’t mix closely with the mind.
patthana20.5:15.1_1: One whose mind doesn’t mix closely with the mind.
patthana20.5:15.1_2: When you don’t mix closely with the mind, thoughts arise because of mind.
patthana20.5:16.1_0: For the sake of letting go of negligence ...
patthana20.5:17.1_0: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts.
patthana20.5:17.1_1: Since the mind is not overcome by lustful thoughts, it arises for the causes.
patthana20.5:17.1_2: Mindfully the mind that arise dependent on the mind and the thought, not for the cause.
patthana20.5:18.1_0: Nine grounds for the sake of wealth ...
patthana20.5:19.1_0: mind doesn’t give rise to the mental processes.
patthana20.5:19.1_1: Taking the mind as a cause, not with a reason.
patthana20.5:19.1_2: mind doesn’t arise dependent on the minds of the mind, nor the level of the mind.
patthana20.5:2.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the thought that relies on the formless.
patthana20.5:20.1_0: Nine what leads to the departed ...
patthana20.5:21.1_0: The cause of the mind is not the cause or condition for the mind.
patthana20.5:21.1_1: The cause of the mind you don’t keep running and circling around the mind.
patthana20.5:21.1_2: Or they don’t keep running and circling around the mind.
patthana20.5:22.1_0: Nine what leads to the departed ...
patthana20.5:23.1_0: Being pressed by the mind, the mental processes arise for the mind.
patthana20.5:24.1_0: Nine what leads to the departed ...
patthana20.5:25.1_0: Being attached to the mind of the mind, the nativeness arises dependent on the mind, and the level of the mind.
patthana20.5:26.1_0: Nine what leads to the departed ...
patthana20.5:27.1_0: Causefulness leads to the mind, phlegming from disorders of mind, mental disorderseverem, and wind.
patthana20.5:28.1_0: Nine what leads to the departed ...
patthana20.5:29.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
patthana20.5:3.1_0: Nor doing on the support for the thought that arises dependent on the perception and the basis for three.
patthana20.5:30.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the three exterior sense fields. ...
patthana20.5:31.1_0: In the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
patthana20.5:32.1_0: Nine grounds for that, relying on the five points ...
patthana20.5:34.1_0: That is the cause, relying on three things that reliest on letting go five aggregates ... five spiritual companions ...
patthana20.5:36.1_0: If, based on the five reasons, relying on one continuity ...
patthana20.5:4.1_0: For the sake of letting go of negligence ...
patthana20.5:5.1_0: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts.
patthana20.5:5.1_1: Mind consciousness doesn’t give rise to the mind.
patthana20.5:6.1_0: Mind consciousness doesn’t give rise to the thought: for the sake of thought, not for the sake of a single thought.
patthana20.5:9.1_0: The cause of mental phenomena don’t arise because of mental.
patthana20.5:9.1_1: The principle not to understand the teaching.
patthana20.5:9.1_2: Thoughts arise for the sake of mental wearing away and the causes and reasons.
